HANGOUTS_DESCRIPTION.message: Talk to your friends and family, right out of the box. No installation, no setup, no *%!#$.

HANGOUTS_SECTION_GROUP_DESCRIPTION.message: Video chat with up to 9 of your friends at the same time for free.

HANGOUTS_SECTION_EVERYWHERE_DESCRIPTION.message: Sign in to your Chromebook and you’re ready to go. No setup required.

HANGOUTS_SECTION_FUN_DESCRIPTION.message: Bring videoconferences to life with effects, emojis and YouTube videos.

HANGOUTS_HINT_DESCRIPTION.message: Hangouts is an easy alternative to Skype®. No setup required. Video chat with up to 9 people for free.

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_SCREENSHARE.message: One click to show others what’s on your screen

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_ADD.message: Watch YouTube videos, collaborate on documents, and add fun effects to your video call

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_INVITE.message: Invite people to your video call with just their email

HANGOUTS_BALLOON_PEOPLE.message: Add up to 9 people to your video chat without installing any complicated software
